summary: The Supporting Patient Education And Knowledge Act of 2025 (SPEAK Act of 2025) aims to improve healthcare information technology access for non-English speakers. It mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a task force and issue guidance on best practices for providing telehealth services, including interpreter use, accessible instructions, digital patient portals, and multi-language patient materials. The guidance will be developed in consultation with various healthcare stakeholders, including providers, insurers, and language service companies.
